full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNGON 'GRO KHRID CHEN BZHI LAS, MAndAL GYI DMIGS RIM BSHAD PA RAB 'BYAMS DGE TSOGS SDUD PA'I NGO MTSAR YID BZHIN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): GSER TOG NO MON KHAN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @026A *, ,(CES MAndAL GYI KHRID DMIGS BSHAD PA RAB 'BYAMS DGE TSOGS SDUD PA'I @026B NGO MTSAR YID BZHIN LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS SRID LA 'DREN BYED KYI 'OD SNANG GSAL BA JA ROD ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS TSE LDAN DANG, AU CU MU CHIN SHOG GI GRVA RIGS MKHYEN DPYOD YANGS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA 'JAM DBYANGS BLO BZANG SOGS KYIS BSKUL NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG GI GZUGS BRNYAN 'CHANG BA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO'AM, ,MING GZHAN GSER TOG HO THOG THU TA'I CHING AER TI NI CHOS KYI RGYAL POR 'BOD PAS RANG GI BSTI GNAS BKRA SHIS GA-YANG 'KHYIL GYI YANG RTZER SBYAR BA'O, ,TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA SE CHEN RGYAL KHAG GI ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO T'A CANG JUN, SE CHEN P'E LE TSE RING BSAM GRUB DANG, GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BCAS, MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BSGRUB PA'I DGES, SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR DAL 'BYOR RTEN BZANG THOB, DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, SA LAM YON TAN YONGS SU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
